content.detailedDescription: Went out to rear garden to lock up shed, looked up and saw 4 craft flying in  triangle formation with a fourth at the rear. took about 3 seconds to fly from west to east. at 2 seconds they seemed to join together and shoot off to the horizon. no sound or trails left behind.
content.summary: 4 ufos in formation over dublin

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were watching tv and she noticed a bright pulsating  star through the living room window facing north.We turned off the tv and looked at it with binoculars and it looked like it was made up of multi colored lights.The weird thing is that it looked like a really bright star and mimiced how a star would act.We thought that we might be crazy but when i looked online some one from where we live had seen the same thing a year ago
content.summary: Looks like a pulsating star to the naked eye but when observed with binoculars there seems to be made op of red green and blue lights

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling out of my driveway on my way to work an overnight shift and noticed 2 red orange balls off in the distance a few miles away. they seamed to be not moving and just hovering there. i knew they where not plaines because they fly over my house all of the time and can see the flashing red and white lights where these where a solid red-orange color. i lost sight of them threw the trees as i drove down the road on my way to work.
content.summary: Pulled out my driveway and say 2 oragne red balls in the distence

content.detailedDescription:
Please contact me via email i would much rather send you the video i shot 
from my phone and possibly a phone conversation. there are too many 
details for me to write down now. the event just happened about 3 hours ago.
i've seen some weird things in the sky before, i'm sure everybody has, 
but i recorded this and there's 3 other witnesses and it really happened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw lights in the sky and they were rotating in formation then disappearing. deploying some sort of craft?

content.detailedDescription: At first, i only saw 1 and what caught my eyes was the color and shape.  it was in a shape of a cross and thicker in the middle and bright orange in color and moving very slowly without any sounds.  as i got closer to my house, i cleared some of the trees and noticed that it had come to a complete stop.  i didn���t see any blinking lights.  as i got in front of my house, i had a clear sight and noticed a 2nd object exactly the same.  the first object had come to a complete stop and the 2nd identical looking object approached very slowly.  i ran in the house to get my cell phone to get a picture and ran to the backyard that gave a complete unobstructed view of where the both objects were.  that was less than 20 seconds and they were no longer there.  ran to the front of the house and did not see or hear anything.
content.summary: Two cross shapped orange crafts

content.detailedDescription: Out walking my dog with a friend i looked up as we came to the main road and saw a red light in the sky i asked my friend what she thought it was and we both stopped and watched as it slowly went over us and continued in a straight line till we could see it no longer..There was no noise and in the centre was a small orange light that seemed to flicker, whatever it was looked like a square and glowed red,there was only one we have never seen anything like that before..Planes at the height it was would have made quite a noise this made no noise at all..
content.summary: Glowing red square with orange light in centre

content.detailedDescription: Have trouble typing call if need more imfo

content.summary: Bright red light moving slowly moving stoping moving then seemed to up and away very fast

content.detailedDescription: Half the sky was full of chemtrails and the other a beautiful blue this afternoon. i was the sky a lot to monitor the clouds. i was told there was an airshow being held this weekend and did notice more planes than usual. but what i saw as i looked around shocked me. i saw three very tiny white dot's extremely high up in the sky. this side of the sky was the all blue part. i noticed the three dot's were equal distance from each other forming a 'v' shape. my first thought was "star's?" couldn't be- it was day light. second thought was satellites but again, no. i knew they were way, way too high up to be a plane or what not. i then noticed a 4th one in front of the formation but of greater distance away and towards the left. i took video aand photo's but after the last picture was taken i couldn't see them any more. i have tried hard to zoom in on the photo's to show proof but my cell phone isn't the best.
content.summary: 4 tiny white dots very, very high up

content.detailedDescription: Have trouble typing call if need more imfo

content.summary: Bright red light moving slowly moving stoping moving then seemed to up and away very fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at a friends house and me and a few friends were sitting on top of some hay bails looking at the sky. ( i live out in the country part of ohio so a lot of corn and bean fields around us as well.
2. a friend pointe it out because they didn't know what it was and we all had then looked at it as well noticing it. and it was out of the ordinary for around here so we were kinda shocked in a way because we had noticed it and was something we never would expect to see.
3. at first before i even looked at it i said its probably just a plane then i looked and it was clearly not a plane at all. at second glance i seemed to think it was a bit orb shaped so round and wasn't normal again.
4. the object seemed to possibly be pretty big not for sure though because i couldn't tell completely. the object seemed to have red lights that seemed glowing but giving off a good amount of light as it were some kind of exterior lights of some sort. the action of the lights were a bit strange because we were sitting on the hay bails and it seemed like they may have been rising up/ hovering up then a little toward us then they both changed directions at the same time. they also stayed nice and lighten up and sorta bright for about a minute and a half then went out then came back on for a few seconds then finally disappeared as if they were going higher and into/ over or out above the clouds where we couldn't see. the motion of it seemed to be coming north then suddenly changed to going north west real quick also note there was no wind tonight.
5. my feeling was shocked because i had a few months before witnessed another thing/ possible ufo sitting i didn't report. so i was a bit shocked in thinking maybe i witnessed another and felt the need to share. my immediate reaction of seeing it was to video it which i did and have some ok video of it. my action after word was talking to my friends about it as we watched the sky for anything else and then when i got home i decided i would report it because it really seemed strange to me and out of the ordinary. during the sighting i kinda felt like wow is that possibly what we all think it is and we all agreed of it being possibly a ufo and they told me to record it. after the sitting i got some goose bumps thinking about it while we all talked about it we all got them because we talked about what tv shows had said happen after the sightings and or what seemed out of the ordinary. 
6. we had lost sight of the object by the light going out either by going into/ up and over the clouds or higher to where we couldn't see so the light sorta faded into the clouds and disappeared and we waited awhile to see if anything came out of the clouds but we didn't see anything.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Witnessed by three people was shocking to us red lights not plane goes across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband mike and i were leaving amc showplace 17 movie theater at 10:20. we went to climb in the car (which was facing north in the parking lot) when we noticed a very, very bright orange light that flickered. initially we thought it was a helicopter flying toward us but the light flickered so we ruled that out. we thought it could be a chinese lantern but ruled that out when an airliner, landing at the indianapolis international airport, flew beneath it. this thing was bigger than the airliner. my husband is an operations manager for federal express at the airport and he could not identify it as an airplane or helicopter.

the closer the object came toward us the brighter the light and we could see a large flame that would be orange but then quickly change from blue to white. the flame had force behind it- like a hot air balloon (which we also ruled out). 

we initially saw this object at 45 degree to our north (right over downtown indianapolis) and continued to watch it until it was 90 degrees overhead. we were in a very well lit parking lot but when the thing flew overhead, it was no longer orange, it was a grey circular shape - the color of fog. it made no noise and continued to fly in a straight line (it had trajectory)to the se.

we lost sight of the object only after it flew overhead and we both climbed in the car wondering what the hell we just saw.
content.summary: Orange colored sphere with flames that when flying overhead appeared as a grey circle/disc

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was driving n on turnersburg hwy (aka hwy 21) coming back from mcdonald's with my dog.

2. traffic suddenly just came to a crawl.  my windows were rolled down for my dog, and there hadn't been any telltale signs of a crash.  we were going and then all of a sudden, a parade of brake lights.  we came to a crawl in front of fort dobbs hardware.  i started looking around to see why everywhere, and then i being frustrated was just staring out my windshield when i saw it.  there were two very large golden balls/spheres about 1/2 mile in the distance  in the sky.  upon proceeding closer, the craft was about 30-40 feet above the field between the captains galley and an abandoned old building.  

3.  i figured maybe someone had put up a radio tower and i hadn't paid it any attention due to being busy.

4. the object consisted of two very large golden balls/ spheres in the sky.  the just hovered for four minutes.  then the balls started to spin rapidly in a circular shape and then it was just gone.

5.  i was initially rather frustrated at first believing that there had been an accident or some problem with traffic.  however when i looked into the sky, i just felt peaceful.  i wasn't scared, just peaceful.  my dog had stopped whining as soon as the traffic stopped.  i thought that was kind of odd, but after it was over i know why now.  really everything became silent.  everything.  there was no sound at all from the ufo or anything around us.

6.  i lost sight of the object when my car was around 60 feet from it.  the balls started to rapidly spin and it took off headed ne towards the east iredell section of the county.  the balls started off spinning slowly, but then they rapidly became faster and faster til it was just a spinning, gold blur and then they shot off in a ne direction.

i want my report to be done anonymously.  i would however like to know if anyone else reports a sighting similar to this.
content.summary: Ufo spotted over statesville, nc 9/1/13

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard, when i looked nw and saw an object to the west of casa grande mtn. it was pulsating red,yellow,white. it would get brighter then dimmer. it would disappear then reappear to the east, then disappear and return. kept pulsating the entire time. started watching around 8 pm through midnight. it was still there.
content.summary: Pulsating 3 lights, hovered,moved, grew brighter then dimmer.

content.detailedDescription:
Actually listening to an interview sitting under a tree where i watch planes approaching pdx & the occasional military f-? "w/2 90��� stabilizers"  & f/22 i saw a silvery what appeared round from my angle of observation, ufo cruising at high rate of speed in straight line on a heading of north aprox 330���.  
      my reaction to it? that all the zombies walking around here have no clue what is going on. :) it's a great time to be a conscious observer.
content.summary: Actually listening to jordan maxwell interview sitting under a tree where i watch planes approaching pdx & the occasional military f-? "w/2 90° stabilizers"  & f/22 i saw ufo cruising at high rate of speed in straight line on a heading of north aprox 330°

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling with my daughter going south on peters creek pkwy in winston salem. i noticed a triangular light formation pass overhead and become visible thru the windshield. it was heading same direction as we were. had three lights, non of which were blinking which is what caught my attention. object began to increase speed significantly as i watched it. it was ejecting what appeared to be red and blue balls of light that shot off in random directions. there was a sparkling trail behind them and they basically flew off and dissapeared. i could hear no sound emitted. picked up great speed and went out of sight. we could still see balls of light ejecting in the distance before losing sight all together. we both were shocked and basically clueless as to what we had seen. i have been around aviation my whole life and ice never seen anything like it. i have seen military jets drop flares and this was not like any i have seen. i called my dad, who has been in aviation 50 years and he too was clueless.
content.summary: Triangular object ejecting balls of light that appeared to have sparkling trails red and blues

content.detailedDescription: After a hot humid day i was in my backyard on a lounge chair looking up at the sky about 9:45pm. i noticed lights moving randomly in the sky. my first thought was a search light from a car dealer. after watching a few minutes i realized the light was coming from above the clouds not from the ground. i continued to watch 5-6 glowing lights move randomly separating and then joining back together. it was as if they were playing tag. the clouds would glow but when they went between clouds i could not see any light. after 5-10 minutes i went in the house and got my wife to come out to see. at first they stayed huddled together and were not moving around. finally they began to move again and my wife could definitely see them too. we watched together for another 5-10 minutes as they moved randomly. then they seemed to form the shape of a comma and stopped moving. then suddenly they each took off in a different direction but evenly spaced at an extremely high speed. just like warp speed each one in its own symmetrical direction like fingers on a open hand. when they took off there was a small white light as each one streaked away. they moved faster than any aircraft can move. i live near fullerton airport and see jets from lax all the time. these were not airplanes. i am not a ufo hunter by any means but both me and my wife are convinced we saw something last night.
content.summary: 5-6 glowing lights above light clouds lighting up clouds and moving randomly apart and back together as if playing a game

content.detailedDescription: On august 31st 2013 just after the sunset behind the santa monica mountains a white contrail could be seen ascending under high velocity at an extremely steep angle. over 10 minutes or so friends and i watched as the object continued to ascend under power and be came more and more over our points of view until the object leaving the contrail became a visible spec about a pencil leads width from the distance in which we were viewing the object. then as the object reached the terminator of night and day in the sky, the object was no longer visible to the naked eye in the night sky, though i could still see the contrail visibly for a few more seconds. the object the disappeared. the los angeles area has huge amounts of air traffic and so seeing air craft is as common as seeing a bird in most instances, what struck me as being odd about the object is that unlike every other aircraft in the field of view, both fixed wing and helicopters, this object had no navigational lights or any other kind of standard aircraft outboard lighting. the objects appeared to me as if it had hit exit velocity and escape the earths gravity, i did not here any tell tail sonic booms to indicate that this was the case, i may have been just to far away to here. the is a naval air station north of los angeles county where it is possible the craft was launched. if it is one of uncle sam's rides then hats off cause that thing was badass!
content.summary: Object acends around sun down visible from north of venice beach, south of the santa monica peer

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from a seeing friends in a field (i was under no influence of any substances) i walked past a supermarket i worked at at the time, i looked to the gas works next to it and saw the triangle formation directly above the cylinders that rise up and down. isosceles in shape i witnessed for over 5 minutes in amazement then lights turned off in quick succession one by one, at first sight i thought  three chinese lanterns but they were remained still and precise in formation and all at the same height, this could suggest a flat underside to a triangluar shaped craft or three light orbs, it was night time so only the lights were visible. i was in some shock as i had been researching phenomina at the time and called up two friends immediately with the news and went back to mine and saw many images and reports of triangle formations confirming what i had just witnessed.
content.summary: Walking home from a field the triangle formation was directly above a gas works, isocelese in shape the lights turned off one by one, at first i thought  three chinese lanterns but they were so still and precise in formation

content.detailedDescription:
My brother was out on the patio alone around 8 45 pm 8/31/2013. he said he looked into the sky and saw an object appear, moving in a straight line over the saddleback mountains from the cleveland national forest. it was moving north east. we live in temescal valley south of corona. 

the object was a bright orange color and appeared to be very low altitude. he said the object slowed down, came to a complete stop and then was hovering. he yelled to me to hurry and come outside and then pointed to this amazing hugh orange light just sitting in the sky. as i stood outside my brother ran to get his night vision goggles. the object still had not moved during the time it took him to come back. looking at it through the night vision goggles my brother observed the object spinning with no tail, no sound, was not a helicopter or aircraft as a commercial plane was seen passing by later. 

we witnessed the object hovering for a few minutes. my brother ran back inside to get a stronger scope and it then moved to the left (north east) very quickly. it began to ascend slowy and the light seemed to suddenly have been turned off. we could see it was still there in the clouds and continued to track it with the night vision goggles. this went on for about 15 to 20 minutes. 

for a moment i didnt want to admit i was overcome with fear. i told my brother, if we can see them, they surely can see us. i ran inside and sent a message to a friend. she then sent me a photo from her friend who witnessed the same ufo to a fault and the same bright orange color. needless to say i was in awe and somewhat in shock. even though et's are no longer fiction, once you are a personal witness, its a life changing experience.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange light hovering over temescal valley, ca

content.detailedDescription: My friends (3) and i were driving from hamilton towards middleton, oh.  we saw them plain as day in the night sky.  there were 6 or 7 of them in the shape of the big dipper, but bigger and brighter than stars.  they were shaped like ovals placed horizontally with a sort of dome on top.  they had some light coming through the bottom, not like a beam, but like they were going to descend and needed to see their way.  initially, they were just hanging there, then they were descending right to left, in doing so slightly changing their formation, and finally began descended left to right, blinking out as they did.  the last one to do seemed to be on fire.  my friends tried to get their cellphone cameras working, but one phone wouldn't turn on, and one phone's video wouldn't show them there.  i felt that they were still there though.  i felt uneasy and wanted to go home.  we got into the car and left, as we were heading towards the city lights of middleton, we saw a plane flying to that exact same area in the sky that it had happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo hovered, then changed direction, blinked out as descending

content.detailedDescription: My friends (3) and i were driving from hamilton towards middleton, oh.  we saw them plain as day in the night sky.  there were 6 or 7 of them in the shape of the big dipper, but bigger and brighter than stars.  they were shaped like ovals placed horizontally with a sort of dome on top.  they had some light coming through the bottom, not like a beam, but like they were going to descend and needed to see their way.  initially, they were just hanging there, then they were descending right to left, in doing so slightly changing their formation, and finally began descended left to right, blinking out as they did.  the last one to do seemed to be on fire.  my friends tried to get their cellphone cameras working, but one phone wouldn't turn on, and one phone's video wouldn't show them there.  i felt that they were still there though.  i felt uneasy and wanted to go home.  we got into the car and left, as we were heading towards the city lights of middleton, we saw a plane flying to that exact same area in the sky that it had happened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo hovered, then changed direction, blinked out as descending

content.detailedDescription:
After watching a glowing orb in our near, low sky the previous two nights (august 29th & august 30th between 9 and 9:30 pm - read previous reports,) my husband and i were prepared on this night (august 31st) to be outside well before the time of the prior sightings. we had our tripods and cameras. it was a cloudy night, so we were uncertain. the children were waiting with us, as they had seen it the previous night. at 9:05 from our back patio, which faces west, coming in from the southwest was a star-like point of yellowish light. as it was moving north east, we realized it was not a star. after about 5 minutes of moving in our direction, it stopped in the same spot that it had the past 2 nights, west from us, about 3 miles away. there it sat for 10 minutes, hovering and moving slightly. it seemed to get bright and dim, but this may be because of clouds or its distance. about ten minutes of hovering above the tree line, it seemed to dim and descended below the tree line. i managed to get photographs with a long camera lens and a tripod. (most of the photos i got captured motion and light trails, so i have omitted those, but saved them.) my husband had his video recorder on a tripod and captured video, as well....Which gives a good indication of our vantage point. (we are unable to successfully upload the video but if mufon would like to see it, please contact us via email.) it was not doing it's obvious ascending/descending, zig-zagging as the previous nights but was agile and moving in a pattern on approach (5 minutes) and once hovering it stayed in place low on the horizon (10 minutes.) silence, again. there is no way this could be a helicopter, airplane, model aircraft, chinese lantern, hot air balloon, star, missile, flare, et al. it's movements, agility, changes in flight pattern and general color combined with no blinking lights on it, really leaves us feeling that this is something we have never seen. and this happened three nights in a row. the first two nights, we came outside around the same time and it was already positioned, hovering in the west, above the tree line at a distance of estimated 3 miles. (read previous reports.) last night, we watched it approach from the south west to the western point of the previous nights. we will be outside and ready at 8:45 tonight (september 1, 2013) to see if it comes back. we hope it does, but what could it mean?

*one other odd thing. there were no stars out because it had been raining and was cloudy, but clearing up. in many of the photos during the period of time it was hovering, tiny points of light (like stars) in the thousands were all around in the sky around this thing, not visible to the naked eye. zoom in on the photos, to see what i mean. i do not attribute them to artifacts in the camera or pixelation as they do not appear in any of the earlier photographs. they are of less concern than the glowing orb visiting our area three nights in a row, but interesting, just the same.
content.summary: Third night in a row golden-orange glowing orb in our area

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i arrived home from dinner  around 10:30pm.  she went inside and i remained outside in front of my house gathering my belonging from my car to bring inside. i noticed past the roof of my house 3 red/orange lights that looked unique, living on long island and in a flight path to lga airport i see a lot of planes (commercial and private) as well as helicopters. i almost instantly ruled out the light that were heading directly towards my home, was a plane or helicopter.  as the 3 identical objects approached in a single file, all proceeded to slow down when directly over me/my home.  i had a great view of the objects, they appeared to descend to about 500-1000 ft as they slowly flew over me. they were white translucent like that illuminated a skeleton on a plane, with wings that were outlined in bright red. i was amazed, excited and very curious. once they passed they seamed to transform back into the orange/red spheres. this could be from the distant from me they covered in seconds.  i immediately called my wife and she came out to witness the 3 spheres head north; its was when i was telling my wife where i first saw them we turned around and a 4th object was heading in the same direction as the first three. the 4th object repeated the same pattern as the others including ascending and slowing when passing us. my wife witnessed the same thing, i had only witnessed moments earlier, however she saw an outline of a head with arms navigating the object and looking down at us (looked to her it  as if it was flying a plane).  the figure turned it���s head and looked down towards us.  all 4 objects headed north (towards the long island sound) and disappeared, instantaneously.
content.summary: 4 transparent white body with red outline object with red outlline , appear in straight line hover over us 1 at a time then head north and vanish

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at a stoplight, and noticed a reflection from the sun. i started to watch it. at first i thought it was a reflection from the sun on to an airplane. saw the side of the object, it was extremely shiny like a mirror, and was turning north. it proceeded north going slow at first then sped up. it was white at this time, and it had no wings, no tail of an airplane. it was a small craft. i live next to a military base and haven't seen this before. as it sped away, don't know if it disappeared or if it just went to fast to noticed.
content.summary: White object in sky

content.detailedDescription: I'd rather talk to someone about my visitation its very personal
content.summary: I had a visitation not a ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was letting out one of our dogs for a midnight potty.  i stepped out with the dog to look at the sky.  

2. notice it?  it was huge/brightly lit.  in the western sky above the trees moving se.  

3.  i thought it was a ufo.  as a pilot i have seen many aircraft and aerial phenomenon.  this was not an aircraft/helicopter/uav.  i have witnessed other ufo's and this was not like anything that fits a definable visual pattern.  

4. briightly lit object in western sky. approximately between 35-40 degree elevation from horizon.  moving in a west to southeastern direction.  altitude, based on penny to dime sized, i would guess 3000-2000 agl (above ground level) hard to tell because the object was super brightly illuminated.  like a huge landing light, but.. it was internally lit.  not gasseous.  but it was like spectral light. no trail.  if it had been a landing light, it would have had a projection beam.  no sound whatsoever. distance traveled, i am guessing but probably 5 miles or less..Because it appeared west of the line of trees in our neighborhood and moved in a line to be over our house in the distance of probably a mile or two. i would say a mile or 2 horizontally from me slant range, because when the spectral light faded, i could see a round orb, that faded into nothingness.  that took probably 10-15 seconds.  
the overall time i observed this object was probably 90 seconds.  i did not have a watch or my cell phone on me at the time.  i checked the clock in the house and it read 11:48pm.  so i am estimating he time to be 11:45 when i first noticed it.  could have been :47 past i don't know.  my dog was acting kind of weird.  she came outside and just stood there. she needed to go out, but then i put her on her chain and she just stood there, and then wanted to go back in the house.  

5.  after i observed the object.  i couldn't sleep.  i texted a couple of my friends and asked if they had seen anything.  right now all over se wisconsin there is the 110th harley motorcycle reunion thing going on, so figured some of my friends might be out late at that, and wondered if they had seen anything.  nobody saw anything.  

6.  i personally saw the bright object fade from brilliant white/yellow and extinguish except for a sphere with a faded white light in the center.  then the object completely vanished.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Super white/yellow almost gold starlike glowing object. west to southeast track. stopped. moved same direction then faded to an unlit orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Amazing sighting lots of witness by the family, we were sat outside due to visiting family then i just looked up. i have an intrest in ufo's then i seen the object and made everyone aware everybody seen it. it was red solid object pulsating very bright although it was round shape the whole object was red no chance this could be a plane as miles from any airport flight paths it was going way to fast for a plane it went across our sight from right to left. then right in front of our eyes it just disappeared. managed to take a photo and very short video off mini ipad footage is poor but you can still see the object. after it was going by felt giddy little excited.
few minutes later helicopter in the very far distance lost sight of it.
content.summary: Red flashing solid object then disappeared right in front of us.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and noticed a red orb just over the tree line moving my direction. it stopped and hovered for a few seconds. then it started changing direction while moving upwards until it disappeared. as it was moving towards me and stopped i tried to take a picture but by camera could not focus on it. as it moved farther upwards i was able to get my camera to focus on it. it made no sound.  helicopter was in the area about five minutes afterwards, not sure if it was because of the orb or not.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb slowly moved towards me and hovered for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: At home 800 block san pedro near gaffey and freeway entrance to either 110 or 47 yo lbc. looked out window saw glowing light, i first thought might be moon, it was not it was a separate entitiy cloaking as cloud and sending what i believe is healing light to the ones (either person or planet) below, slowly pulsating light and in my opinion healing light.
content.summary: Yellow glowing crescent cloaking or behind cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep, so i suggested to my boyfriend that we go out and look at the sky. i live in a heavily light-polluted area, so getting a good look at the stars is a rare occurrence. with few clouds and the moon out of view, for once, there were a fair amount of visible stars. we grabbed a blanket, set it up on my front lawn, and fixed our eyes on a stationary star above us in attempt to see some shooting stars. 

after about 20 minutes of laying and staring we both witnessed an extremely bright circular object appear right before our eyes. it looked kind of like a star, in that it was white-blue in color and the same spherical shape, however it seemed much closer and was brighter than anything i have ever witnessed in the night sky. i immediately felt emotional, sitting up and beginning to cry for unknown reasons. it only lasted for a second or two before fading out and disappearing completely, without moving from it's original location. 

after seeing this, we were both confused and shocked. we began to rule out what it couldn't be, and were left with no explanation as to what it was. after a few minutes (5-10) of frenzied ideas, while still staring at the sky, the light returned -- this time slightly above our heads and behind us, but bright enough so as soon as it appeared we were both fixated on it. it behaved exactly as it did the first time, eliciting the same emotional reaction, and faded out just as quickly.

i have been interested in the possibilities that the night sky holds for some time, and have spent plenty of time staring up -- in my area and other more secluded regions where the stars are plentiful and easily seen, but i have never seen anything like this before. this was brighter any star, plane, or satellite i have ever seen and too perfectly circular to be just an iridium flare.
content.summary: Sudden bright white-blue light appeared in the night sky, remained stationary, then faded away -- only to reappear minutes later in a different location.
